title: BEACON HILL-CHARLES ST STUDIO STEPS TO MASS GENERAL & RED LINE!
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE 09/01/2022', 'An updated studio, 1 bath rental apartment for lease on Charles St in Beacon Hill.', ' The unit is located in a professionally managed building that includes heat and hot water in the rent price and is just steps to MGH and the MBTA Red Line!', ' Cats ok-no dogs, no undergrad students, and no off-street parking.', 'Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'BenC @', 'Benjaminapartments .', 'com', '860-485-5721', 'Transportation', 'Bus: 9 Boylston St @ Berkeley St (0.51 mi)', 'Bus: 43 Charles St @ Beacon St (0.18 mi)', 'Tram: D Arlington (0.45 mi)', 'Bus: SL4 Washington St @ Essex St (0.60 mi)', 'Bus: SL5 Tremont St @ Boylston Station (0.49 mi)', 'Subway: Orange Line Chinatown (0.58 mi)', 'Subway: Red Line Charles/MGH (0.19 mi)', 'Tram: B Park Street (0.45 mi)', 'Tram: C Park Street (0.45 mi)', 'Tram: E Park Street (0.45 mi)', 'Bus: 15 Cambridge St @ Bowdoin St (0.46 mi)', 'Subway: Blue Line Bowdoin (0.49 mi)', 'Bus: 4 Portland St @ Causeway St (0.62 mi)']
